text: Support 20% increase in company sales within the first year.
Display product catalog with images and descriptions.
Ability to create a new account with a unique email address.
System compatibility with Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems.
Provide 'Forgot Password' feature for account recovery.
The software must be able to process 1,000 transactions per minute.
Users should be able to customize their profile settings.
